name: Chill & Zombies
description:
〈怠惰一下・來點殭屍〉是一款俯視射擊的小遊戲。在黑暗的殭屍末日，努力把光明找回來。
這款遊戲是學長Abby的粉絲二創（實況：twitch.tv/luckykira），遊戲主角是她的V皮形象，記得去看她的台。

Chill & Zombies is a mini top-down shooter. Your goal is to bring back the light to this dark zombie apocalypse.
This game is a tribute to my favorite streamer - Abby (twitch.tv/luckykira) The protagonist is her virtual avatar. Please check her out!

殺殭屍、占點、開燈！
Turn on the lights! Not only shooting.
  • 雖說是射擊遊戲，光射擊是不行的，還有更重要的事要做。
    Just shooting and killing zombies will not win the game. There is something else to do!


不被限制的俯視角度。
Different angles. Different Top-down feelings.
  • 有時候眺望遠方，有時候環顧四周，無縫變換。
    Sometimes you want to look far forward. Sometimes you want to look around you. You are free to do so.
多種武器選擇。
Multiple weapon choices.
  • 五加一種攻擊方式，大槍並不總是管用，請隨機應變。
    You have 5 guns + 1. Bigger is not always better. Be adaptive.

P.S. 這是我做的第一款遊戲，甚至是我寫的第一個程式，肯定很多問題，歡迎向我反映，我會盡我所能處理，感恩。
P.P.S. 我有些繼續豐富這遊戲想法、點子，可能未來會做，但不保證，我也是很怠惰的。

P.S. This is my first game, my first program even. It must be buggy. Please feel free to tell me. I will try my best. Many thanks.
P.P.S. I have some ideas about expanding this game. I might do it in the future, but this is not a promise. I'm lazy, too.
